name: Security Headers & Caching
author: Studio Be4

sections.description:
Studio Be4 is an agency specialized in web design and development that has designed and developed this plugin for Security Headers, which helps increase the security of websites by checking the HTTP headers of the visited page.
The plugin checks for common security headers, such as Content-Security-Policy, Strict-Transport-Security, and X-XSS-Protection, and provides suggestions for improving the security of the website.
The plugin is easy to install and use, and it is recommended for anyone who wants to improve the security of their web browsing experience:

- X-Powered-By
- Content-Security-Policy
- Strict-Transport-Security
- X-Xss-Protection
- X-Frame-Options
- X-Content-Type-Options
- Referrer-Policy
- Permissions-Policy
- Cache-Control

The “Security Headers & Caching” option is added under “Settings” menu.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the “Security Headers & Caching” plugin (FTP) to the directory ‘/wp-content/plugins/’.
  2. Download the plugin from the WordPress library.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

short_description: Plugin to generate Security Headers and Caching on Class A++
